review:
I was visit Dr DK Clinic some of friends recommended there name , actually my mother has suffered from knee pain and he was well explained regarding her problem 
He is non commercial doctor and best the part is Doctor was not told me to do surgery firstly he said give medicine that I recommended you then we take next action.
After that he said for X-ray and then I came to doctor for surgery 
Most of my friends recommended for there name and he is very genuine 
Now my mother is pain relief 
So If anybody wants joint replacement I recommended Dr DK Das for that 
Thanks

I was facing the pain last 7 years. One of my relative suggest me to meet with Dr DK das .

The day when I meet with Dr and today is a day , fully changed and fully recover from spine pain and hip pain.
1. Nature of doctor is too much polite 
2. Staff courtesy is good
3. During the time of bed rest in hospital that time regular check time to time 
4 . Proper time to time I feel proper change and improvement in my pain and surgery
5. At last the money wise , the whole procedure is in economically and affordable to me.

Surly I will recommend Dr D.K. Das

I had right knee joint pain for over 10years, I had visited several doctors..but unfortunately their diagnosis were very wrong, so much so one had told me to do open heart surgery as, as per that guy 'I was having steptococcus virus in my joints and it also had affected my heart'..but the results of tests to surely know were all negetive..at a point of time I was so frustrated I completely stopped seeing any doctor. Then much much later, recently I contacted one of my school friend Dr. Arindam Mukherjee and he recommended Dr. D.K. Das and to my surprise he cured my knee pain in a week by administering a type of injection (I don't know the name)!! I am so grateful to him and his team, thank you!!!üòÄüòÄüôèüôèüôè

Very indifferent doctor. Firstly, Comes late all the time. Overbooks appointments. Tried to see 2 times after the first time but never got to see him anywhere near the promised time. Got a call 2+ hours after the promised time to come see him both times. It's as if only his time is valuable and we are just at his mercy in this whole wide world. Secondly, he doesn't honour the appointments booked through Practo which contributes to the problem of a high wait time. Lastly, I found him to be an arrogant, but that's a subjective matter and others might feel differently. Also, I cannot comment on the treatment provided as I haven't been able to consult with him after the first time. Need to have 1 follow up consultation atleast to review. But I highly doubt I will do that.

VERY ETHICAL  AND GENUINE DOCTOR ..HIS APPROACH IS TOTALLY NON COMMERCIALLY   .... Thank you Dr Das because of you my husband could walk   after such massive accident .let me describe .. My husband had a bad accident and injured his knee with complicated fracture .. Dr Das was very kind to see him on Sunday and advised us very genuinely ...he wants to try with plaster rather than surgery ..Though he is a very renowned surgeon .. this shows his honesty towards a patient ... I would suggest everybody  for any orthopedic problem one should visit him .. he has magic in his hands .. specially knee replacement surgery .. his team members are very cooperative .. I would recommend him always for ortho problem ... IT IS RARE TO FIND SUCH KIND HEARTED DOCTOR IN THIS MORDEN WORLD üôèüôè
reply_text: Thank you so much for your genuine appreciation üôèüôèüôè

review:
Sincere thanks from the bottom of my heart
Dear Sir,
I would sincerely like to express my gratefulness for saving my Wife , she has got a severe injury during his road accident. We all were worried that he must have got a fracture, but thanks to you and your staff who had taken corrective action at the right time, the injury could be treated on time. I am truly obliged to you for this.
My wife is recovering very fast with the medicines prescribed by you. The credit for the same goes to you and your staff who had taken proper care of him when he was in the clinic. My wife too remembers your kindness and generosity.
Once again, thank you for all your kindness and cooperation.
Yours Sincerely,
Saroj Kumar Jena

My name is Aniruddha Mukhopadhyay. Visit to doctor but he was not in town but Dr. Vishal was attend us and he is very good doctor. We are satisfy with doctor. But the system in this chamber is very bad and just money making machine. Doctor prescribe a injection for Vitamin 'D' and assistant told that same is done here and we took the same from there only @ Rs.500.00 but when check with medicine shop, I was shocked, actual price is only Rs. 36.00. Again ask to this guy why you are charging so much and he told me that this is as per Dr. instruction.
We all are believe on Dr. like god and they are always try to make money from us. But that should be a limit. Not like charge Rs.500 agaisnt Rs.36/-.
Please don't go to this chamber and not recommended anybody for Dr. D.K.Das.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I visited the doctor this winter and asked about the pain in my knees. The doctor was very polite and explained to me in detail the reason why I was facing the pain issue. He also suggested me some medicines and lifestyle modifications that help me recover from my knee pain faster and sooner. 

I will always recommend Dr. D. K. Das to everyone facing any problem related to bones and joints.
reply_text: Thank you Shristi for your kind words ..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
the doctor is good, however the ladies at the reception are very unprofessional. i am just sharing ,what happened with me.
till the time i did not make the payment, i was the third in line to see the doctor. the moment i made the payment, my turn went down to 5 or 6. when i asked her about it she said there were few people already queued.

This was very nice experience while visiting Dr. D.K.Das.I took my aunt to him as she was suffering from arthritis both knee were not working. Then one of my friend suggested me to visit Dr. Dk Das after all the check ups she was adviced to go for  knee replacement. We gone TKR with Dr. DK Das and now she is doing well in daily activity.
Thank you doctor.

he took out the issue and make the treatment asap, that creates confidence in problem , very happy with service and kind of nature of dr and way of explaining me the problem. superb , 
surly i will suggest Dr. D.K. Das

Went for treatment of frozen shoulder. Was administered an injection worth Rs 5000/-. When I asked about the injection, the doc as well his staff flatly refused to give out the name of the injection. **** *********** ******* ***** *** ********* ******* ***** **** *** * ******* ****** *** ***** *** ** **** ****** Every patient has a right to know what medicines he's being prescribed.
reply_text: We are sorry to say there must have been some communication gap .. defiantly you have the right to ask the name of the injection and we will let you know .. Doctor will be happy to tel you in detail whatever quairy you have .. please try to have some faith in doctors ... as they are taking care of your pain and saving lives in this pandemic where everybody is staying at home üôèüôèüôè

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had pain in both my elbows for 7-8 months. The problem was diagnosed in my first visit itself. Not only that it was explained to me by the doctor so that I could understand the treatment being given. Just one week later I am 90% recovered. I am extremely satisfied and happy that I visited Dr Das for my treatment. The entire staff is extremely helpful as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I Was Told By Another Doctor, That it would be A Long Procedure and Rehabilitation Lengthy, BUT DESPITE A BROKEN PATELA( Knee Cap into 8+pcs), I Was Operated Within 3 Hours of Injury, Sent Home in 24 Hours, Was Able To Walk Unaided in 8 Weeks. Truly An Angel Doctor With A Divine Touch.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words .. Your genuine appreciation means a lot to us .. üôè

review:
I was having knee pain and joint pain from last 2years after visiting several drs i went to dr das .
I was wondering that when other drs was telling me to go for surgery but dr das suggested me to have a vit d test and i did and found it was very much low then he told me to take vit D inj twice in a month and he told me to do some exercise .
I did it for 2months and now im am fit and there is no need for any surgery.
Thanks to Dr Das for saving my money and time with his right guidance . I would say he is a good dr.

Hi I m babita..my mother is severely suffering from knee pain..she could nt walk properly bt when I met to d.r d.k das,he assured me for complete relief of knee and joint pain..he suggested me for knee replacement surgery bt I was fearing that may be good or nt bt after complete assurance then Dr d.k das done knee replacement surgery of my mother..now my mother and me totally satisfied from his treatment and my mother walk properly without any help...my big tks to Dr d.k das..you are a such great orthopaedic dr in Delhi...my mother is very happy from his treatment..tks alot doctor..I want to suggest all patients should be visit Dr d.k das for joint pain and knee replacement surgery

He is a wonderful doctor, he changed my father's life completely. My father could hardly stand properly due to his bent legs and weak muscles. Dr Das corrected his bent knee problem with joint replacement surgery and his very good physiotherapy team changed my father's life.. Now he enjoys his daily morning and evening walk with his friends. Keep up the good work...

** ** **** ******* ************ I met him when my son's friend recommended me for my joint replacement surgery for my very painful knee joint. Especially getting up from low floor was very painful. I was very afraid of replacement surgery but when I met his patients I agreed for surgery. He did joint replacement on my both knees. Now I am taking physiotherapy course but till today I have no pain and my Gait is improved. Thank you very much for everything. Keep up this good job..

he is an amazing doctor, i am just wondering what he did to my moms knees, she is total painfree. her bent knees are now straight and painless. my mom was badly sufferring her old knee problem seen many high profile hospitals . Dr Das has gifted hands* ** ** **** *** ** ***

A big no from me. Very unprofessional and irresponsible. He suggested 1 month water proof plaster . Like any effecient sales agent he pressurise me to opt for water proof plaster only  as it will be a big safegauard against sweat,rain etc. but within a week it turn out to be big  disaster it swelled my feet and the excuse given by this well known dr.is that my skin is sensitive.please don't go and waste your money
Happy to have consulted  Dr. Das. Excellent Doctor with good explanation and resolution. I would recommend Dr. Das for all joint pain

Dr. DK Das is friendly but ** ** ********** *** *** **** ******. What I disliked is he tried to make us come for second visit and did not give solution at the first visit. Gives multiple painkillers to reduce pain immediately, *** **** *** ** ** *** **** ** *** ******* *** ***** *** The only good thing he suggested was the blood test, but he didn't even bother to give meds ********* ***** ***** Not visiting him again for consultation.
The Doctor was very calm and soft spoken.He listens to patients and give remedies instantly.** ** ************* *** the way he give solutions to problems that tremendous.i recommend the doctor
Extremely kind and quick to address problem and suggest resolution, Patient can feel confident and start recovery thanks to such pleasing and helpful insights ..I highly recommend!

review: I met with doctor first time. My mother had problem of joint pain in both of her knees.and Dr. Das has carefully examined the both the knees and diagnosed the same. Overall I can say him nice doctor and very well approach towards the problem.

Went to doctor for knee pain. He gave 5-6 tablets in morning and evening. Also suggested to get physiotherapy sessions from his clinic at additional costs per day for around 15days. The list of medicines didn‚Äôt help at all and after 15days doctor started suggesting to go for some injections. I didn‚Äôt feel it right and felt like it was for other benefits and not helping patient. I went to other doctors *** **** **** **** ********* ********** **** *** *********

review:
The way Dr.Das helped me to understand reason for my shoulder pain and the way he explained all the medicine and there benefit made a great impact. His friendly nature makes a patient relax.

Dr.Shalini (physio) did her work excellently making me comfortable. She is great at her work, very polite in nature and friendly.
She explained all the necessary precautions I need to take while doing my exercises and the correct posture for each exercise.

I visited the doctor for my knee pain I am fully satisfied with the treatment and as well as his behavior he is v.humble and generous Doctor I have recommended my cousin for the spine pain even he is also satisfied I would like to recommend him to more persons known to me ...

He was really nice person and imparted best instruction to the patient related to their deseases. The result of treatment are awaiting.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** *********** ****** ** ******  I Got a injury on my shoulders I visited some other doctor he ADVICED SURGERY  but I refuse his advice  then I was met DR. D.K.DAS he said no need to do any surgery u can take medicines only . Results are wonderingly, he has magic in his hands &he is 100% genuine &loyal with his patients  ,thanks a lot!!

This was follow-up visit as prescribed. Firstly doctor DK das was not available. Secondly I was told to get treated by his second in command. **** ******** **** ***** *** ** *********** ** ** ********* **** *** ********** ********** **** the blood test results were all normal. I was told told to do more test and Just to tell me that I should now do MRI the doctor charged me 800Rs. **** ***** ******* *** **** ***** ***** ** ******** I am not going to this doc anymore

One of my aunty has problem with knees. we had gone to a lot of doctors they all suggested us for surgery then one of my friend told us about Doctor DK DAS after that we went to Doctor DK DAS and she told the doctor all  her troubles and he understood her well and now she is fine without any surgery. He is very frank and listen to patient very friendly and informal method. Thank you so much

I had severe Heel pain .in my wife MRS LUXMI ... I visited so many doctors in all corporate hospitals, every body advice me to undergo spine surgery but one of my friend suggested MR Mahesh  to visit Dr DK Das ,after consulting I found he was very genuine and logical in his medical approach he told let's try with Physiotherapist , I found very very effective results. This treatment saves my money and painfull surgery both.

Thanks 
Dr DK Sir
Nice doctor.sincere thanks to the staff and hope for the **** result for The treatment for my mother
good to have such a doctor. My grandmaa was unable to walk before the knee replacement but now with the help of dr. Dk das she is good to go anywhere
